newsitem.title: INDIA: India Nov '96 cement output, despatches rise.
newsitem.headline: India Nov '96 cement output, despatches rise.

text.p: India's cement production in November 1996 rose to 5.291 million tonnes against 5.220 million in October, while despatches improved to 5.355 million tonnes from 5.200 million, the Cement Manufacturers' Association said.

For the April-November 1996 period, the first five months of fiscal 1996/97 (April-March), the output grew 10.45 percent to 44.640 million tonnes from 40.417 million in the year-ago period, the association said in a statement on Thursday.
Despatches during the period rose 9.84 percent to 44.424 million tonnes from 40.445 million.
It said private sector companies accounted for the increase in output and despatches, while the state-run firms saw negative growth.

Output in the private sector rose 11.66 percent to 42.207 million tonnes during April-November 1996 against 37.801 million in the year-ago period. Despatches were up 11.07 percent at 42.003 million tonnes against 37.818 million.

The production of state-run firms dropped 7.0 percent to 2.433 million tonnes in the same period against 2.616 million a year ago. Despatches fell 7.84 percent to 2.421 million tonnes from 2.627 million, the statement said.
